original_title: Joel Creasey: The Acid Tongue Prince
overview: Joel Creasey likes to speak his mind. Nothing is sacred. In The Acid Tongue Prince Joel recounts his stories of run-ins with celebrities, politicians, football teams, regional towns and of course his parents - creating controversy wherever he goes. Armed with his razor sharp wit and skin-tight jeans, nobody is safe. With award nominations, sell out shows and TV and radio appearances there is no doubt that Joel Creasey is one of Australia's hottest rising stars of comedy.
title: Joel Creasey: The Acid Tongue Prince
